text: aur hamane raat aur din ko (apanee qudarat kee) do nishaaniyaan qaraar diya phir hamane raat kee nishaanee (chaand) ko dhundhala banaaya aur din kee nishaanee (sooraj) ko raushan banaaya (ki sab cheeze dikhaee den) taaki tum log apane paravaradigaar ka phazal dhoondhate phiron aur taaki tum barason kee ginatee aur hisaab ko jaano (boojhon) aur hamane har cheez ko khoob achchhee tarah taphaseel se bayaan kar diya hai
